Text: Installation Instructions:- First install lucky patcher, second install swype keyboard (dont open it) now open lucky patcher and click on swype + Dragon from app menu. click open menu for patches, click remove license verification, click on Auto modes, check on Auto modes and other patches (Extreme Mode) Now Apply. hope this help sorry for my English :(
